heading: Tuesday Night
text: Rising chance of showers late, more so along and east of the Greens.

heading: Wednesday
text: Rain early, mainly east, then scattered showers/storms.

heading: Thursday
text: Chance of showers south; likely north and could mix with snow over the summits.
temperature: Valleys upper 40s to upper 50s, north to south

heading: Friday
text: Chance of showers north; snow showers possible over high terrain.
temperature: Valleys mid 40s to around 50 north, low to mid 50s south
